subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy shot an eight-under-par 64 to take a one-stroke lead in the Shanghai Masters, a lucrative invitational tournament that is not sanctioned by any of the major tours.
snippet: Rory McIlroy shot an eight-under-par 64 to take a one-stroke lead in the Shanghai Masters, a lucrative invitational tournament that is not sanctioned by any of the major tours.
